item.title: Debugging Django emails
item.description: Run in terminal: python -m smtpd -n -c DebuggingServer localhost:1025 After that: EMAIL_HOST = 'localhost' EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD = '' EMAIL_HOST_USER = '' EMAIL_PORT = 1025 EMAIL_USE_SSL = False Then you get email contents printed to terminal: ![django-email-debug.png]((/wiki/images/django-email-debug.png)
